title: PayrollProcessType
description: Provides the information needed to process a payroll.

PayrollDeployment.description: Contains a collection of information about the deployment of a payroll payee  within an employment or work context. Deployment details include information about a resource's job, position, work schedule, assignment entry reason, as well as information identifying the organization and/or organizational sub-units associated with the deployment. Indicative Deployment Details, contains the subclass of deployment details relavent to Indicative Data use cases (e.g., provisioning an benefits outsourcer's system).

personName.description: Allows for a person's name and/or the person's known as name.

personlegal.description: Includes PersonBase (legalid, birthdate, gender, citizenship, residence country, military status, ethnicity) and PersonLegal (passport, father/mother name, race, birthplace, deathdate, nationality, marital status, visa, religion, student info).

deployment.description: Information about the person's position, organization, and work location.

workRelationshipLifecycle.description: NOTE: This may belong to DeploymentType.

paymentInstruction.description: Instructions for payment method and amount.

deductionInstruction.description: Instructions for General and Benefits deductions.

statutoryInstruction.description: Instructions for statutory deductions including social insurance, taxes, and garnishments.
